txt.en: 'Without their grim masters to drive them forth, the Orcs cast down their weapons and fled back through the Gate!'
'The Black Gate of Mordor was thrown down, and the Last Alliance pushed forth to confront the Dark Lord himself!'
'But that... is a tale of its own!'
'Upon the battle plain, the lines of war were drawn...'
'Orcs, Easterlings, Southrons, and evil beasts all stood in defiance of the Last Alliance of Elves and Men.'
'At Sauron's command, the nine Ringwraiths rushed forth from the Black Land to bolster his vast armies...'
'The Nine wielded fear itself against the Last Alliance and all but the boldest quailed before them!'
Instance: Memories of the Last Alliance
'Without fear, Gil-galad and Elendil the Tall raised spear and sword to defy them!'
'Even the Nine could not withstand Aiglos and Narsil, and they were struck down -- banished back to Mordor!'
